cnbc.summary: Downdetector showed user reports of problems at sites including Amazon, Snapchat, Disney+, Reddit and Canva.

cnbc.title: Apple closes at record after strong iPhone 17 sales report for U.S., China
cnbc.summary: The iPhone 17 series has outsold the iPhone 16 series by 14% in the U.S. and China within its first 10 days of availability.

cnbc.summary: President Trump is threatening to call in federal troops to San Francisco as evidence mounts that the city is undergoing a post-pandemic resurgence.

cnbc.summary: Apple's stock hits a record high as Jim Cramer tells investors to hold, citing strong iPhone demand, services growth and market momentum.

cnbc.summary: Comey argued that he is being vindictively prosecuted because of President Donald Trump's animus toward him.

cnbc.summary: After White House AI and crypto czar David Sacks went after Anthropic last week, OpenAI investor Reid Hoffman came to the company's defense.
